thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 6 of 141
thread.title: Jill

author: Jill
title: Jill
text: I have to label EVERYTHING that my son takes to school (boarding). Mabel's Labels haven't failed me yet! I recently reordered, and the package options were different than the previous time. It would be great if I could configure my own package. I do cringe a little at the price (what? how much? for labels?), but remember, how well they work and know that it is money well spent!
